title.narrative: Jiangxi Ji'an Sustainable Urban Transport Project

description.narrative: The outcome will be efficient multimodal access to major activity centers in Ji'an. Through the project, the planned high-speed railway station and surrounding new development area will be linked to the existing city with well-designed multimodal transport infrastructure, greenway development, and integrated public transport services.
